# The `directory_iterator` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An input iterator over the entries in a virtual path, similar to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/directory-iterator">llvm::sys::fs::directory&#95;iterator</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An input iterator over the entries in a virtual path, similar to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/directory-iterator">llvm::sys::fs::directory&#95;iterator</a>.

Definition at line 179 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h">VirtualFileSystem.h</a>.
